articles.author: By David Linton dlinton@thesunchronicle.com
articles.title: Alleged mastermind in $2 million Attleboro gold theft to stand trial
articles.description: ATTLEBORO — The alleged mastermind of the “Ocean’s Eleven,” high-tech, $2 million gold heist at an Attleboro jewelry company a decade ago is scheduled to stand trial on Monday.
